mainText: Mormon Chapter 5, Verse 23 - Know ye not that ye are in the hands of God?
1st Nephi Chapter 17, Verse 13 - I will also be your light in the wilderness; and I will prepare the way before you.
1st Nephi Chapter 21, Verse 16 - Behold, I have graven thee upon the palms of my hands.
Enos Chapter 1, Verse 27 - Come unto me, ye blessed, there is a place prepared for you in the mansions of my Father.
Mosiah Chapter 4, Verse 9 - Believe that man doth not comprehend all the things which the Lord can comprehend.
